backend/main.mo: Defines booking, provider, rental, and user profile types with comparison helpers and initializes related Maps with authorization and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptive summaries of various frontend files for reference or documentation purposes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS variables for themes and applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point containing a root div and script loading the main frontend bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with RootLayout and all application routes, wrapped in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied card with an alert icon and a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with status handling and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireLogi: Wrapper that prompts users to log in before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Renders a visual badge for each booking status with predefined labels and variants.
Renders the EYEGIC text logo with optional sizing variants and link behavior.
frontend/src/components/forms/Availabili: UI component for selecting single or ranged dates with time inputs and emitting a formatted availability string.
frontend/src/components/forms/MockOtpVer: Simulates OTP sending and verification with mock codes, input handling, and success/error states.
frontend/src/components/forms/OptionalPh: Optional image uploader that previews selected photos and allows removing or replacing the file.
frontend/src/components/icons/WhatsAppIc: Renders an SVG WhatsApp icon with customizable className.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Page wrapper providing max‑width layout, optional title/description, and standard spacing.
frontend/src/components/layout/RootLayou: App root layout containing header, footer, and routed page content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with navigation, contact actions, branding, and build info display.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with navigation links, contact options, authentication controls, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/profile/FrameSha: Exports SVG icons representing various eyewear frame shapes.
Renders a list of frame-shape checkbox options with icons and manages toggling selected shapes.
frontend/src/config/buildInfo.ts: Exports a build identifier loaded from environment variables with a fallback string.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useBooking.t: Fetches a single booking by ID using react-query and the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateOpt: Creates an optician booking via actor API and invalidates customerBookings on success.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateRen: Creates a rental booking through the actor and refreshes customerBookings afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateRep: Creates a repair booking with optional details and invalidates customerBookings.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCustomerB: Loads all bookings belonging to the current customer using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useProviderB: Fetches bookings for the current provider when the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useUpdateBoo: Updates a booking’s status and invalidates provider, customer, and single booking queries.
Empty file placeholder for site-logo related logic.
frontend/src/hooks/profile/useCallerUser: Retrieves the logged-in user's profile and exposes loading state adjustments.
frontend/src/hooks/profile/useProfileCom: Queries the actor for numeric profile completion percentage.
frontend/src/hooks/profile/useProfilePic: Provides mutations to update profile and prescription pictures and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/profile/useSaveCaller: Saves the caller's profile via actor API and invalidates profile-related queries.
Fetches provider info for current identity and provides onboarding mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/rentals/useRentalCata: Loads the rental catalog items from the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance tied to identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, login, logout, and identity loading behavior.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theming variables, dark mode, and shared UI utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/BookingDetai: Displays full details for a specific booking, including status, service info, address, pricing, and navigation back to the bookings list.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/mobile-optic: Shows confirmation details for a completed mobile optician booking, including service info, address, and total price.
Form page for creating a mobile optician booking with service selection, contact details, scheduling, and price calculation.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/MyBookingsPa: Lists all bookings for the logged-in customer with status, schedule, pricing, and options to view details.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/rentals/Rent: Displays confirmation details for a rental booking, including rental info, delivery address, and payment breakdown.
Renders a rental booking form that calculates pricing, validates input, and submits a new rental booking. Handles item lookup, error states, and redirects to a confirmation page.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/repairs/Repa: Displays repair booking confirmation details including status, service info, and pricing. Handles loading, missing booking states, and navigation options.
Provides a form for submitting repair service requests with optional details, photos, and preferred date. Sends booking data to the backend and redirects to a confirmation page on success.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero content, service categories, and a how-it-works section with navigation to booking pages.
frontend/src/pages/profile/MyProfilePage: Shows and edits user profile data including personal details, preferences, and pictures. Supports uploading, previewing, and saving profile and prescription images.
frontend/src/pages/provider/ProviderDash: Displays provider details and assigned bookings with controls to update booking statuses. Handles login requirements, provider registration flow, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/provider/ProviderOnbo: Implements a multi-step provider onboarding form with validation, service selection, phone/email verification, and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/rentals/RentalItemDet: Displays detailed information for a rental item, including pricing, availability, and service highlights, with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/rentals/RentalsCatalo: Shows a searchable and filterable catalog of rental items with category selection and availability indicators.
frontend/src/pages/services/MobileOptici: Presents the mobile optician service overview with features, imagery, and navigation to booking.
Provides an overview of the eyewear rentals offering with benefits, imagery, and a link to the catalog.
Describes available eyewear repair services with feature listing, imagery, and navigation to booking.
frontend/src/pages/settings/BrandingLogo: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Contains helper functions to format numbers as INR currency strings with and without a slash suffix.
frontend/src/utils/logoDataUrl.ts: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading URL params (query or hash) and persisting them via sessionStorage, plus helpers for clearing stored or hash parameters.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Provides validation and sanitization for phone numbers, emails, and PIN codes, including normalization utilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining content paths, theming extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing issues, features, and state information for the EYEGIC Bookings project.
